name: Bed Pan
specifications: Molded plastic or stainless steel; shallow basin design; approximately 35 x 28 x 10 cm.
function: Used for collection of urine and feces from bedridden or immobile patients.
usage: Wear gloves; assist patient into correct position; place bed pan beneath buttocks; maintain privacy; remove carefully when finished; provide perineal care.
maintenance: Disinfect after each use; wear gloves to prevent cross-contamination; assess for skin irritation beneath the pan.
warning: Improper placement causing spills or discomfort; forgetting to wash hands or clean the patient after use.
